msg: a couple of minor modifications to the release notes

author: hwright
msg: Add another Pool helper function to allocate a single item of a given type.

author: kwright
msg: Fix for CONNECTORS-112.  Introduce isnew as part of every connection object, to allow the code to prevent unintentional overwrite of a connection.
